name: Flickr WordPress Widget
author: Maik Balleyer (Biloba IT)

sections.description:
The plugin fetch a rss feed of a flickr photostream and show the images in a sidebar widget. You can activate a
lightbox feature if lightbox is installed.

Biloba IT

This plugin was developed by Biloba IT.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the design tab and drag&drop the widget to the right place
  4. Enter the title, amount of images and the rss url for working
sections.changelog:
2.2

  • Edit html tags to get correct validation for xhtml
  • Remove stylesheet include from plugin-code to theme header
  • Tested with wp version 3.0.4

2.1

  • Choose size of images
  • Add link to flickr image if no lightbox is installed
  • Add more link

2.0

  • Get images from a flickr rss feed.
  • Use lightbox if it is installed.
  • Amount of images

short_description: Import photos from a flickr rss feed to a wordpress widget.
